PRIVACY.TEXT: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. By continuing to use this website, you agree to their use.

ONE.TITLE: Ducatus Coin
ONE.TEXT: Inspired by the ancient Roman trading coin and fuelled by the revolutionary spirit that created digital money, Ducatus Coin presents an alternative form of financial exchange – one that is inclusive, unique and offers boundless possibilities.

TWO.TITLE: Cryptocurrency for everyday living
TWO.TEXT: Enjoy the freedom of cashless, borderless and secure everyday transactions, from buying your morning coffee to purchasing your dream home, now all possible with Ducatus Coin.

THREE.TITLE: Championing the crypto-economy
THREE.TEXT: With Distribution, Convertibility and Usability (DUC) at its core, Ducatus Coin encourages the practical use and application of cryptocurrency in real life. These traits are instrumental in helping build a solid crypto-economy for the future.

FINANCIAL.TITLE: A New Financial Evolution
FINANCIAL.SUBTITLE: To be the world’s most popular and usable cryptocurrency…
FINANCIAL.TEXT_1:
One Ducatus Per Person on the Planet.

Based on the principles of the Italian mathematician Leonardo Fibonacci, Ducatus has generated a total of 7, 778, 742, 049 crypto coins.Once these coins have all been distributed, their number will be similar to the number of people on our planet.

The vision for Ducatus Coin is bold. But with a combination of world - class digital infrastructure, a powerful network distribution system, and a suite of related crypto - economy businesses, it is a goal that is not impossible to achieve.
FINANCIAL.TEXT_2: Ducatus Coin owners can now access a wide range of products and services both from Ducatus Crypto - Economy businesses and third - party merchants. These crypto - economy businesses are being rolled out around the word in parallel with the distribution of our coins to demonstrate real - world applications not only for Ducatus Coin but also for cryptocurrencies as a whole.

SECTION_1.TITLE_1:
Communities popularise technologies.
Companies like Ducatus make them mainstream.
SECTION_1.TEXT_1: Ducatus Coins are pre-mined and sold, then profits are invested to build the brand.
SECTION_1.TEXT_2: Coin technology is developed internally based on our strategic long - term business plan.

USABILITY.TITLE: Usability with the Ducatus Crypto-Economy
USABILITY.SUBTITLE: Use Ducatus Coins to buy coffee, book a holiday, shop for souvenirs. You can even purchase property or your dream home, if you wish. These and more financial exchanges are made possible through the unique Ducatus Crypto-Economy.
USABILITY.TEXT: Ducatus believes that usability is the ultimate measure of legitimate currency. In support of this vision, Ducatus affiliate businesses offering basic needs were created to deliver ease and convenience to Ducatus Coin and other crypto users. These Ducatus businesses are the cornerstones of the Ducatus Crypto-Economy. From buying an espresso to booking a room at a luxury hotel, transactions that used to be cash-only can now be cashless, through the use of Ducatus Coin.

One Ducatus Per Person on the Planet. Based on the principles of the Italian mathematician Leonardo Fibonacci, Ducatus hasgenerated a total of 7,778,742,049 crypto coins Once these coins have all been distributed, their number will be similar to the number of people on our planet.

The vision for Ducatus Coin is bold. But with a combination of world-class digital infrastructure, a powerful network distribution system, and a suite of related crypto-economy businesses, it is a goal that is not impossible to achieve.

Ducatus Coin owners can now access a wide range of products and services both from Ducatus Crypto-Economy businesses and third-party merchants. These crypto-economy businesses are being rolled out around the word in parallel with the distribution of our coins to demonstrate real-world applications not only for Ducatus Coin but also for cryptocurrencies as a whole.

FOUR.TITLE:
Usability with the Ducatus
Crypto-Economy
FOUR.TEXT:
Use Ducatus Coins to buy coffee, book a holiday, shop for souvenirs. You can even purchase property or your dream home if you wish.

These and more financial exchanges are made possible through the unique Ducatus Crypto-Economy. Ducatus believes that usability is the ultimate measure of legitimate currency. In support of this vision, Ducatus affiliate businesses offering basic needs were created to deliver ease and convenience to Ducatus Coin and other crypto users. These Ducatus businesses are the cornerstones of the Ducatus Crypto-Economy. From buying an espresso to booking a room at a luxury hotel, transactions that used to be cash-only can now be cashless, through the use of Ducatus Coin.

SECTION_1.TITLE: About Ducatus Coin
SECTION_1.TEXT: Convenient, fast, and secure, Ducatus Coin is a cryptocurrency created for long-term usability. Ducatus Coin is the only cryptocurrency supported by the one-of-a-kind Ducatus Crypto-Economy, a group of growing Ducatus affiliate businesses that advances cashless transactions for life’s basic necessities: food, clothing, shelter, rest and relaxation, and more.

SECTION_2.TITLE: Advantages of Ducatus Coin
SECTION_2.SUBTITLE: Ducatus Coin combines the benefits of Bitcoin with a forward-thinking strategic business model – the Ducatus Crypto-Economy.

LIST.TEXT_1: Best-in-class security from a constantly evolving technology
LIST.TEXT_2: 10x faster fund transfers than Bitcoin due to 1 minute block times
LIST.TEXT_3: Transfer funds anywhere in the world at minimal cost
LIST.TEXT_4: All the benefits of a global financial system right in your smartphone
LIST.TEXT_5: Supported by a strategic infrastructure designed to advance global acceptance and adoption of cryptocurrency
LIST.TEXT_6: Ducatus management ensures that Ducatus Coin conforms to global laws and regulations

TECHNOLOGY.TITLE: Ducatus Coin Technology
TECHNOLOGY.SUBTITLE: Ducatus Coin is a fork of Litecoin and thus uses scrypt as the basis of a Proof of Work algorithm.

LIST.TEXT_15: Buying Ducatus Coins with Bitcoin, Ethereum and credit card became possible through the updated Ducatus Wallet
LIST.TEXT_14: A fork of the Ethereum blockchain, DucatusX was created to support both transactions and the creation of smart contracts
LIST.TEXT_13: Ducatus Coins and physical gold (in the form of coins and bars) were registered on the blockchain and offered as a single package through Remus Gold
LIST.TEXT_12: Online purchase of Ducatus Coins started via ducatuscoins.com
LIST.TEXT_11: The multi-currency Ducatus Wallet was launched
LIST.TEXT_10: 1 Billion Ducatus Coins have been sold since its introduction in 2017
LIST.TEXT_9: The multi-currency Ducatus Wallet was launched.
LIST.TEXT_8: Ducatus was listed as “10 Fastest Growing Blockchain Solutions Providers to Watch in 2019” by APAC Business Headlines.
LIST.TEXT_7: Ducatus Coin was listed on Coinbene cryptocurrency exchange.
LIST.TEXT_6: Ducatus sponsored Blockchain Cruise Asia, a major regional blockchain and cryptocurrency event.
LIST.TEXT_5: The Ducatus blockchain was launched and the first live public Ducatus transaction was executed by our CEO Ronny Tome with Dustin Trammell at the Ducatus European Summit in Rome.
LIST.TEXT_4: On-blockchain mining was completed for all Ducatus coins.
LIST.TEXT_3: The Ducatus corporate office was inaugurated in Singapore.
LIST.TEXT_2: The Ducatus technology work-week was hosted by Dustin Trammell at DEFCON XXV in Las Vegas.
LIST.TEXT_1: The Ducatus brand and first Ducatus Technical White Paper were launched at the Ducatus Global Summit in Dubai.

INFO.TEXT:
The exact amount of DUC as per BTC/ETH payment received will be sent to the indicated DUC wallet. However, if the money received falls short of the USD amount stated for the chosen package, then the system by default will only submit the number of entries for the draw based on the lower package.

To buy DUC in multiples of 1000 USD, you may do so in separate transactions, as the entries awarded per transaction is capped at 150, equivalent to a 1000 USD purchase.

THREE.TITLE: Privacy Policy
THREE.TEXT_1:
This Privacy Policy is designed to inform you of our policies regarding the collection, use and disclosure of Personal Data we receive from you, as well as to assist you in making an informed decision before providing us with any of your Personal Information.

In this Privacy Policy, “we”, “us”, “our” shall mean Centurion Global Limited having its registered office in the Cayman Islands (as Controller according to the European General Data Protection Regulation ("GDPR") and its affiliates and related companies namely, Emperor Holdings Limited having its registered office in the Cayman Islands, in their capacity as Recipients and Processors under GDPR.

If you, at any time, have any queries on this Privacy Policy or any other queries in relation to how we may manage, process and protect your personal data, please do not hesitate to contact our Data Protection Officer (whose contact details are set out below).

support@ducatus.net
Attention: Data Protection Officer

By using the Site and/or our other services and/or products, you express your agreement with this Policy and the conditions of processing your Personal Data contained herein; if you do not agree with these conditions, you should not use the Site and/or our other services and/or products.
THREE.TEXT_2: Personal Data: While using the Site, and/or our services and/or our products we may ask you to provide us Personal Data that can be used to contact or identify you. “Personal Data” is defined to mean data, whether true or not, about an individual who can be identified from that data, or from that data and other information to which an organisation has or is likely to have access provided that to the extent you reside in, or are otherwise subject to the personal data laws of, a jurisdiction the relevant laws or other applicable rules of which provide for a different definition of personal data, the definition of “Personal Data” hereunder shall be construed to also encompass any other types of data that are included in such different definition. The Personal Data that we may collect from you includes, but is not limited to, your salutation, name, company, designation, industry, gender, country of residence, contact number and one or more email addresses.

CONTENT.TITLE: About DucatusX
CONTENT.TEXT: Created to support peer-to-peer transactions, as well as the creation of smart contracts, DucatusX is a fork of the Ethereum blockchain. But unlike Ethereum, DucatusX uses a “Proof of Authority” consensus algorithm which significantly reduces its maintenance cost. In the future, it is envisioned to switch to “Proof of Stake”, giving users even more confidence in choosing DucatusX for their projects. On DucatusX, the blocks are produced regularly by 3 proven and secured nodes, resulting in stable cost and reliable speed of block production.

BLOCK_1.TITLE: Why DucX
BLOCK_1.TEXT_1: Trustworthy projects, no scam tokens allowed
BLOCK_1.TEXT_3: Total number of DucX fixed at maximum 777.874.204

BLOCK_2.TITLE: DucatusX Resources

BLOCK_2.TEXT_4: DucatusX can be converted from and into Ducatus (DUC) by a fixed ratio of 1:10 on https://www.ducatuscoins.com/buy
BLOCK_2.TEXT_6: DucatusX supports smart contracts and allows you to tokenize your assets. The process is simple, all you have to do is to follow the steps on http://ducx.mywish.io/create. A token created on DucatusX may be sold through AA+ after being accepted for listing.
BLOCK_2.TEXT_7: Create the right amount of tokens through DucatusX.
BLOCK_2.TEXT_9: Make a crowdsale contract using your created token, no need to create a new one.
BLOCK_2.TEXT_10: You can distribute tokens on your own.
BLOCK_2.TEXT_12:
To attract investments to your project, you can create a token contract and sell it through a crowdsale. To get project tokens, buyers will need to send you DucX, which you can then spend for the project’s needs.
